description.narrative: In this pilot project a company mapping will be conducted in all the companies employing workers in the sectors covered by the Zambian National Union of Communication Workers NUCW. The aim is to compile accurate information about numbers and profiles of em ployees, their salary levels and conditions, current status and future plans of the companies in general, unionization level of employees and the type of negotiation culture prevailing in the companies. The union?s membership register will be updated and b ased on this and the company mapping a growth strategy for the union will be elaborated. Negotiation skills of the top leadership will be improved and the 16 regional chairpersons and secretaries will benefit from leadership skills training. Recruitment ca mpaigning especially among young workers will be initiated. By so doing it is expected that the representativeness of the union and the rights awareness of the members are improved and this in turn gives chances to improve the varying working conditions in the sector. The aim of the pilot year is to create a solid basis for NUCW to grow and become more visible and relevant actor among the youngish work force. The beneficiaries of the project are current and future members of NUCW and employees of the sector in general. The implementing organization is the National Union of Communication Workers NUCW.
